MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel is still ongoing. This is due to further work required on the network to complete repairs and we now expect power to be back on by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:55PM on Friday 15 January 2021.
